============
Introduction
============

``prudence`` is a lightweight tool for building command-line applications.


Objectives
----------


Installing
----------

Install and update using `pip`:

.. code-block:: bash

   pip install -U prudence


A Simple Example
----------------

.. code-block:: python

   from prudence import main

   main()
